name: Meteor Shower:Dodge It!(PC)
description:
Meteor Shower:Dodge it! is basically  a game to develop for Android and release it on Play Store.But before that, I've just want to give you guys a taste of what I imagine as my really first official game idea.

THIS IS NOT A FINAL PRODUCT! -Well this game is still in development because there are more things that I wanted to add like -Player skins,other obstacles,difficulty and final boss maybe???

CONTROLS-WASD-You guys already know what that mean right?No?Okay then:

  • W>Up
  • S>Down
  • A>Left
  • D>Right

OPTIONS- The OPTIONS menu only have a volume settings and it didn't function for this prototype.Sorry for this.

DONATE!! -I'm not forcing you guys to pay or donate this game but if you guys like the idea and want me to make this game looks good as soon as possible you can donate as minimum as $2.00!People who donate will credits in this games if the game get its own fate and release.
